Title: CloneFactory
Description:
CloneFactory is a class for deep cloning any object or struct.
Cloning behaviour may be specified either by the use of attributes, or by code.
HomeWiki:
Deep Cloning of CLR Objects and structs
CloneFactory is a class for deep cloning any object or struct.
Cloning behaviour may be specified either by the use of attributes, or by code.

The main focus when developing the CloneFactory has been performance, and large parts of the logic is therefore implemented by using IL code.

For use in your own project, you only need to include the source file CloneFactory.cs
